products.shortdescription: POCO C61 is a smartphone that redefines perfection in terms of both performance and elegance. Everywhere you go, with its exquisite Radiant Ring design and high-quality glass back, it makes a statement. Whether you're gaming at maximum speed or surfing via social media, the 90 Hz display guarantees a smooth experience. Furthermore, with Corning Gorilla Glass 3 Protection installed, the POCO C61 provides unparalleled resistance to scuffs and falls. The fingerprint sensor that is integrated into your phone makes unlocking it fast and safe, and its robust RAM makes multitasking easy. Additionally, take stylish pictures of any moment with the 8 MP AI Dual Camera and the included vintage effects. Plus, make use of the enormous 5000 mAh Weekend battery and the quick 10 W Type-C charging for endless pleasure. By selecting the POCO C61, you can get unprecedented levels of mobile experience.

fulldescription.title: Radiant Ring Design
fulldescription.description: Envision possessing an object of ultimate elegance in your grasp. The Radiant Ring design of the POCO C61 feels like a seamless extension of your personal style in addition to being visually appealing. It's more than simply a phone with its high-quality glass back—it's a fashion statement.

fulldescription.title: Vibrant Display
fulldescription.description: Experience a world of unmatched visual bliss with the 90 Hz display on the POCO C61. Every swipe and press feels like a smooth, responsive tango, whether you're playing fast-paced video games or browsing through your social media feed.

specification.inthebox: Handset, 10W Charger, USB Type-C Cable, Sim Eject Tool, Protective Case, Quick Start Guide, Warranty Card
